title: Airbus Delivers Key System for NASA’s Gateway Space Station
summary:
Airbus Defence and Space has announced that it has delivered the first two units of the key electrical subsystem for the HALO module of NASA’s lunar Gateway Space Station. The Gateway’s Power Management and Distribution Subsystem (PMAD) will manage the generation, storage, and distribution of the station’s electrical power—equivalent to the output of seven average-sized […]
The post Airbus Delivers Key System for NASA’s Gateway Space Station appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: AST SpaceMobile strikes spectrum deal amid Ligado Networks bankruptcy
summary:
Satellite operator AST SpaceMobile hopes to turbocharge its proposed direct-to-smartphone services with L-band spectrum from Ligado Networks, which filed for bankruptcy after GPS interference concerns derailed its terrestrial 5G plans.

title: How US-Indian NISAR Satellite Will Offer Unique Window on Earth
summary: A Q&A with the lead U.S. scientist of the mission, which will track changes in everything from wetlands to ice sheets to infrastructure damaged by natural disasters.
